Html:
I have tried with 2 different scanners, the QR code seems to add a carriage return on my qr code. This causes me issues on a website I am working on.

I don't want this feature. Is it possible to switch this off?


Thank you

Could you include a sample code image? There shouldn't be anything extra other than the one you put in.

Also please provide your string input with that code image.

On top of that, if you could try that image on ZXing's decoder first, if that one decode fine then there is nothing I can do about it.

decoder address: http://zxing.org/w/decode.jspx
